```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
##map on healthy and concussed participants

normal_youth <- normal_youth %>% ungroup() %>% select( stroop_reaction_time_incongruent_median, digit_symbol_duration_median, immediate_recall_correct, delayed_recall_correct, balance_mean_distance_from_center, trails_b_duration_mean, flanker_reaction_time_correct_median)

concussed_youth <- concussed_youth %>% ungroup() %>% select( stroop_reaction_time_incongruent_median, digit_symbol_duration_median, immediate_recall_correct, delayed_recall_correct, balance_mean_distance_from_center, trails_b_duration_mean, flanker_reaction_time_correct_median)

concussed_youth[,1:7] <- sapply(concussed_youth[,1:7], as.numeric)

normal_youth$group <- 'Healthy'
concussed_youth$group <- 'Concussion'

t <- t.test(normal_youth$flanker_reaction_time_correct_median,concussed_youth$flanker_reaction_time_correct_median)

groups_combined <- rbind(normal_youth, concussed_youth)

##FLANKER
flanker_plot <- ggplot(groups_combined, aes(flanker_reaction_time_correct_median, fill = group)) + geom_histogram(alpha = 0.5, breaks = seq(0,1.8, by = .05),aes(y = ..ncount..), position = 'identity', col = "black")
```
